devdoc.details: the polls could be spamed with proposals to reduce iteration speed

params._description: a subtle description of the poll
params._endDate: the end date of the proposal (0 for no end date)
params._standardPoll: if true, yes and no proposal will be created and further proposal creation prohibited
params._startDate: the start date of the proposal
params._votingChoice: how double votes should be counted

params._pollId: the id of the proposal which it is part of
params._proposalDescription: the high level description of the proposal

params._pollId: the id of the poll requested

getPollAmount().return: returns the amount of polls stored in this contract

params._proposalId: the Id of the searched proposal

getProposal(uint256).return: the proposal with the given id as single values

params._pollId: the id of the poll that is to be searched

createProposal(string,string,uint256).notice: creates a proposal and saves it seperated in an array

getPoll(uint256).notice: returns a poll with the given id

getPollAmount().notice: returns the amount of polls stored in this contract

getProposalsFromPoll(uint256).notice: returns an array with the proposal ids for a specific poll
